entry.title: PowerDyne Dumbbell Stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Training Equipment
Price: 140.00

  • Holds 2 PowerDyne Dumbbells
  • Steel Hardware & Base
  • Height: 24.2-inches
  • Heavy-Duty Brake Locks
  • Swivel Caster Wheels

Take your home gym setup to the next level with the PowerDyne Stand compatible with all versions of PowerDyne Adjustable Dumbbells. The base is made with heavy-duty steel and holds two (2) PowerDyne Dumbbells at a time. Transport your set from one place to another with four (4) swivel caster wheels made of nylon with steel brake locks. Place the stand on a smooth surface and lock it securely in place before use.

Material: Steel, Nylon

Dimensions: 27.56x 22.64x24.2-inches (LxWxH). Tray Dimension measures: 16.25" L x 7.85" W.

entry.title: PowerDyne Adjustable 55lbs Dumbbell (Pair)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Training Equipment
Price: 369.95

● Free Standard Shipping!
● 10 to 110lbs (55lbs each)
● 20 Iron Weight Plates
● No-Slip Grip
● Compact Design
● Ships in 4 Packages

Tone and sculpt specific muscle groups while increasing strength with the PowerDyne 55lbs Adjustable Dumbbell. Ten (10) adjustable iron weight plates increment from 5lbs up to 55lbs to match your training intensity. To adjust the dumbbell weight, unlock, align to the desired weight, and secure back into place. Safely and securely lift weights with no-slip grip handles. The compact design measures 9.25x15.5x3.75-inches in a sturdy and secure storage tray with lifting handles. The perfect addition to your home gym!


Weight Increments: 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, 15, 18, 20, 22, 24, 26, 28, 33, 37, 42, 46, 51 to 55 lbs.
Materials: Iron, Aluminum, Glass Fiber Filled Nylon, Polycarbonate & Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene Plastic.
Care: Avoid moisture and use in a dry environment.
Shipping: The product will ship in 4 separate packages.

entry.title: PowerDyne Adjustable 80lbs Dumbbell (Pair)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Training Equipment
Price: 594.95

● Free Standard Shipping!
● Lift Up to 160lbs (80lbs each)
● 20 Iron Weight Plates
● Compact Design No-Slip Grip
● No-Slip Grip
● Shipped in 4 Packages

The PowerDyne Adjustable Dumbbell Set includes 2 dumbbells: the essential heavy-duty weight equipment to sculpt and tone muscles throughout the body. Increase your strength with 2 sets of 10 adjustable iron weight plates that increment from 5lbs up to 80lbs each. Securely lift a total of 160lbs with no-slip grip handles. To increase the dumbbell weight, unlock, adjust the pin boxes, align to the desired weight, then secure back into place. The compact design features 2 sturdy and secure 18x9x9inch storage trays.

Weight Increments: 5, 10, 14, 18, 23, 28, 32, 36, 40, 44, 48, 53, 58, 60, 65, 70, 75 to 80 lbs.
Materials: Iron, Aluminum, Glass Fiber Filled Nylon, Polycarbonate & Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene Plastic.
Care: Avoid moisture and use in a dry environment.
Shipping: The product will ship in 4 separate packages.
